dmca.title: Cease and Desist Order - Unauthorized Use of Personal Name and Domain in Pornografic
dmca.body:
Cease and Desist Order - Unauthorized Use of Personal Name and Domain in Pornografic Websites

The domains below are unfairly using my name, Priscila Scimidt, and mentioning my website Pharus as linked to sales of "Law Courses" in CDRom, along with pornographic materials.
My domain (www.pharus.adv.br) is a strictly serious work, developed along years of research, and has strict regulations. I feel harassed regarding my interests of developing a high standard database in Law, Medical Sciences and E-learning:


ER
